EmailTemplate.subject: Fresh market insights reveal employer priorities for improving the health of their employees
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
2023 Virtual Care Transformation Index Today's workplaces look and operate much differently than they did just a few years ago. How are you supporting employers so they'll be ready for whatever comes next?
We recently asked more than 300 HR benefit decision makers, at companies with 2,500 or more employees, about how they see virtual care and digital health tools fitting into their future planning. The results show that a large number are turning to virtual care to address their toughest market challenges <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/resources/report/2023-virtual-care-transformation-index-5-ways-employers-are-putting-health-within-reach/?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=health-plan&utm_term=in-text-cta&utm_campaign=OTH-202309-EMP-HCT-VIRTUAL-TRANSFORMATION-EBOOK&utm_campaign_id=VCT1]]>
- More than 80% reported closing health disparity gaps as very important to their organization - 80% of employers said they will focus expansion of mental health services for adolescents over the next three years - 83% of HR leaders agree virtual care programs can help ensure clinically appropriate access to GLP-1 medications About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives.
